div.a: Parent Information on student work for 4th Qtr. Read more...

br.p: The district will begin providing students with academic work only in core subject areas on Wednesday, April 15. Work packets for only students without internet/electronic device access in core subject areas will be available for pickup on Wednesday, April 15 from 10:30 a.m.-12:30 p.m. and on Mondayâs in the following weeks.

div.a: Student Information Letter to Parents on instruction to students during COVID-19 School Closureï»¿ï»¿
Message from the Superintendent -School Closure until May 1, 2020
The all-school play has been rescheduled to May 22 and May 23. All School Play "The Wizarding World of Sherry Carter: Finding the Missing Pieces"

p.span: We are committed to providing a website that is accessible to the widest possible audience, regardless of technology or ability. This website endeavors to comply with best practices and standards defined by Section 508 of the U.S. Rehabilitation Act. If you would like additional assistance or have accessibility concerns, please contact the webmaster. We are always striving to improve the accessibility standards of our website.
